title: உதயநிதி ஸ்டாலின் 72000 கிமீ பிரசாரப் பயணம் செய்ததாகச் சொன்னாரா?
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim:
26 Days, 36 M.P Constituencies, 18 By-election Constituencies, 140+ Assembly Constituencies, Over 7200kms across the state. 



Thank you all for the love, support and affection. It is been a humbling experience. 



Please go out and cast your vote on 18th April! #myvoteforDMK
